name: Karl
descriptions: Karl is a member of the Family in Capital Wasteland in 2277.

Karl was married to a woman named Skyler and they lived together in Meresti before her death. They used to be shop owners in Megaton, and Vance encountered them while getting supplies. Vance felt a kinship with them and invited them to join him. Karl is gruff and has a short temper; he prefers others leave him alone. He is cynical, suspicious of others and thinks the worst of them.
Karl does not believe in Vance's vampiric teachings but plays the part in order to keep his store in the Meresti Metro Station.

topics.response_text: Well, well. I haven't had a customer in a while. Last one I had was a bit chewy... know what I mean?{sarcasm laden}

topics.topic_text: Hey, hot stuff. Why don't you tell me how I can see Ian?
topics.response_text: Now that's more like it! I finally won't have to pay for it anymore. Ha ha ha!{laugh at the end}

topics.topic_text: You really have a bad attitude.

topics.topic_text: Can't you just help out without being so mean?

Can I see what you have for sale?

This place is my place of business. If you wanna buy something, then buy. If you wanna flap your lips, take a hike.
We're the last people you want to mess with... that's for damn sure.

conversation.response_text: Human or not, I don't care. You got caps, I got stuff.
